data¶

make_dataset.py¶

src.data.make_dataset.authenticate_kaggle_api()[source]¶

This function is used for Kaggle API authentication.

src.data.make_dataset.generate_raw(file: str)[source]¶

This function generates the csv dataset.

Parameters

file (str) – name of the dataset

src.data.make_dataset.get_raw_kaggle(competition_name: str, file: str, path_file: str)[source]¶

This function get the competition datasets from Kaggle API.

Parameters

  • competition_name (str) – name of the competition

  • file (str) – name of the dataset

  • path_file (str) – path defined to store the .zip
